context: Analyze this standing pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Goddess Pose (Utkata Konasana) Wide-legged squat with arms in various positions. Consider the Hip opening, leg strength, pelvic floor engagement. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Wide-legged squat with arms in various positions
practitioner.primaryFocus: Hip opening, leg strength, pelvic floor engagement

specificNeeds: Hip opening, leg strength, pelvic floor engagement
